summary.subject: CfP EICS 2026 - First Submission Round

submission_process.review_process: Papers may be accepted after submission and review, or may be recommended for revisions.

summary.conference_scope: The conference focuses on engineering interactive computing systems and their user interfaces, including aspects like usability, user experience, reliability, and security.
topics: Modelling, specification and analysis of interaction and interactive systems
Methods, processes, and tools for building interactive systems
Formal methods within interactive systems engineering
Bridging the gap between engineering and design practices
Computational techniques for designing and evaluating interactive systems
Engineering hardware or software integration in interactive systems
Engineering interactive systems for diverse user groups
Applying AI technologies in methods, processes, and tools for interactive systems
